title: 258 - Bruce Banner
description:
“The more rational your thinking, the more rational your decisions. The more rational your decisions, the probability of the outcomes being great are significantly higher than when you are in an emotional state.” 

In today’s episode, the guys are discussing the problem of making decisions based on feelings rather than on what is real, factual, and rational. Commit to making decisions rationally. Your life and legacy depend on it.
itunes:author: The Resonance Network
